noticias.title: Joaquin Phoenix to star in new Ari Aster film
noticias.description: Oscar-winning actor Joaquin Phoenix is set to star in the upcoming horror movie directed by Ari Aster, the director of 'Midsommar' and 'Hereditary'. The film is currently in pre-production and is expected to be released in 2022.

noticias.title: Marvel announces new 'Blade' movie with Mahershala Ali
noticias.description: Marvel Studios has officially announced a new 'Blade' movie starring Mahershala Ali as the titular vampire hunter. The movie will be part of the Marvel Cinematic Universe and is expected to be released in 2023.

noticias.title: Christopher Nolan's new film to be released exclusively in theaters
noticias.description: Acclaimed director Christopher Nolan's latest film, 'Oppenheimer', will be released exclusively in theaters. The movie is based on the life of J. Robert Oppenheimer, the physicist who helped develop the atomic bomb. It is set to be released in July 2022.
